welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Panthersville, a charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a wonderful time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fulton County Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, featuring a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport, offering flights to destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gwinnett County Airport is reserved for private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
